data.title: 键入缺少的字母，完成下面的文字
data.blankContent: To prepare oneself for action, knowing one's surroundings is not enough; one must also know oneself, if only to know one's position and capacities. An ____ must ____ imagine ____ to ____ before ____. In ____ way, knowing ____ to ____ able ____ him. As ____ as ____ correctly ____ the ____ of ____ actions ____ may ____, ____ is ____ of ____ them. This is why reflection is at the heart of preparation for action.
data.partBlankContent: To prepare oneself for action, knowing one's surroundings is not enough; one must also know oneself, if only to know one's position and capacities. An ag___ must of___ imagine h__ to a__ before act___. In th__ way, knowing him____ to b_ able ena____ him. As so__ as h_ correctly antic______ the res____ of t__ actions h_ may unde_____, h_ is cap____ of atta_____ them. This is why reflection is at the heart of preparation for action.
data.fullContent: To prepare oneself for action, knowing one's surroundings is not enough; one must also know oneself, if only to know one's position and capacities. An agent must often imagine how to act before action. In this way, knowing himself to be able enables him. As soon as he correctly anticipates the results of the actions he may undertake, he is capable of attaining them. This is why reflection is at the heart of preparation for action.
data.answer: 要做好行动的准备，仅仅了解周围的环境是不够的;一个人也必须了解自己，如果只知道自己的地位和能力。一个行动者必须经常在行动之前想象如何行动。这样，知道自己能行就能成全他。一旦他正确地预测了他可能采取的行动的结果，他就能够实现这些结果。这就是为什么反思是行动准备的核心。
